title: Core Plugin Architecture Review
spec: Review includes/Plugin.php for singleton pattern correctness, DI container initialization, hook registration order, and plugin lifecycle management (activation/deactivation). Check for memory leaks, proper dependency resolution, and WordPress best practices compliance.

title: Dependency Injection Container Review
spec: Review includes/Container/Container.php and ServiceProvider.php for proper service registration, singleton vs factory behavior, circular dependency handling, and lazy loading of services. Verify interface binding and resolution logic.

title: Service Provider Registration Review
spec: Review all files in includes/Providers/ (CoreServiceProvider, DatabaseServiceProvider, MediaServiceProvider, PerformanceServiceProvider, AIServiceProvider, RESTServiceProvider, SchedulerServiceProvider) for proper service binding, dependency ordering, and initialization logic.

title: Autoloader and Namespace Review
spec: Review includes/autoload.php for PSR-4 compliance, proper namespace mapping, error handling for missing classes, and performance of class loading. Verify all classes are properly namespaced.

title: Contracts and Interfaces Review
spec: Review all interfaces in includes/Contracts/ for proper abstraction, method signatures, return type declarations, and documentation. Ensure interfaces follow ISP (Interface Segregation Principle).

title: Database Analyzer Review
spec: Review includes/database/Analyzer.php for SQL query safety, accurate size calculations, proper caching strategy (5-min TTL), and handling of large databases. Check for N+1 queries and proper use of $wpdb->prepare().

title: Database Revisions Manager Review
spec: Review includes/database/RevisionsManager.php for safe revision deletion logic, configurable retention, proper batch processing, and recovery mechanisms. Verify it doesn't delete revisions of unpublished posts incorrectly.

title: Database Transients Cleaner Review
spec: Review includes/database/TransientsCleaner.php for proper expired transient detection, handling of site transients vs regular transients, and multisite compatibility. Check for race conditions during cleanup.

title: Database Trash Cleaner Review
spec: Review includes/database/TrashCleaner.php for safe trash/spam post deletion, proper handling of scheduled posts, attachment cleanup, and comment spam removal. Verify no accidental deletion of valid content.

title: Database Orphaned Cleaner Review
spec: Review includes/database/OrphanedCleaner.php for accurate orphaned metadata detection (postmeta, usermeta, commentmeta), safe cleanup logic, and handling of multisite metadata. Check for false positives.

title: Database Optimizer Review
spec: Review includes/database/Optimizer.php for safe table optimization operations, InnoDB vs MyISAM handling, table locking implications, and progress reporting. Verify it handles large tables gracefully.

title: Database Orphaned Tables Review
spec: Review includes/database/OrphanedTables.php for accurate detection of tables from deactivated plugins, safe deletion safeguards, and handling of shared tables. Check false positive prevention.

title: Database Connection Wrapper Review
spec: Review includes/database/WpdbConnection.php for proper $wpdb wrapping, error handling, query logging, and connection state management. Verify it properly handles reconnection scenarios.

title: Database Cleanup Task Review
spec: Review includes/database/Tasks/DatabaseCleanupTask.php for proper WP-Cron integration, batch processing, error recovery, and progress tracking. Check for timeout handling on long-running cleanups.

title: Media Scanner Review
spec: Review includes/media/Scanner.php for efficient media library scanning, proper detection of unused/duplicate/large files, batch processing with generators, and memory management for large libraries.

title: Media Duplicate Detector Review
spec: Review includes/media/DuplicateDetector.php for accurate duplicate detection algorithm (hash-based vs content-based), handling of different image sizes, and performance with large media libraries.

title: Media Large Files Review
spec: Review includes/media/LargeFiles.php for configurable threshold detection, proper size calculation, handling of different file types, and integration with optimization recommendations.

title: Media Alt Text Checker Review
spec: Review includes/media/AltTextChecker.php for accurate detection of missing alt text, handling of decorative images, multilingual support (WPML/Polylang), and accessibility compliance reporting.

title: Media Safe Delete Review
spec: Review includes/media/SafeDelete.php for two-step deletion mechanism, 30-day recovery window implementation, proper file system cleanup, and thumbnail handling. Verify recovery actually works.

title: Media Reference Finder Review
spec: Review includes/media/ReferenceFinder.php for detection accuracy across content, ACF fields, Elementor widgets, WooCommerce products, and custom tables. Check for false negatives that could cause data loss.

title: Media Exclusions Review
spec: Review includes/media/Exclusions.php for pattern matching logic, user-defined exclusion handling, and proper integration with scanner. Verify exclusions are respected in all delete operations.

title: Media Scan Task Review
spec: Review includes/media/Tasks/MediaScanTask.php for scheduled scanning implementation, incremental scanning support, and resource-efficient processing. Check for proper locking to prevent concurrent scans.

title: Plugin Profiler Review
spec: Review includes/performance/PluginProfiler.php for accurate plugin performance measurement, minimal overhead profiling, proper hook timing, and memory tracking. Verify results are reliable.

title: Query Monitor Review
spec: Review includes/performance/QueryMonitor.php for slow query detection, EXPLAIN analysis integration, query grouping, and duplicate query detection. Check for performance impact of monitoring itself.

title: Heartbeat Controller Review
spec: Review includes/performance/HeartbeatController.php for proper WordPress Heartbeat API control, location-based settings (admin, frontend, post editor), and interval management. Verify it doesn't break dependent features.

title: AJAX Monitor Review
spec: Review includes/performance/AjaxMonitor.php for AJAX request tracking, rate limiting implementation, admin-ajax.php monitoring, and request categorization. Check for security of logged data.

title: Cache Checker Review
spec: Review includes/performance/CacheChecker.php for accurate detection of object cache (Redis, Memcached), page cache, and browser cache status. Verify compatibility checks with popular caching plugins.

title: Autoload Analyzer Review
spec: Review includes/performance/AutoloadAnalyzer.php for autoloaded options analysis, size calculations, performance impact assessment, and recommendations for oversized autoload data.

title: Performance Check Task Review
spec: Review includes/performance/Tasks/PerformanceCheckTask.php for scheduled performance monitoring, metric collection, alerting logic, and historical data storage.

title: AI Recommendations Engine Review
spec: Review includes/ai/Recommendations.php for recommendation generation algorithm, prioritization logic, caching strategy, and relevance of suggestions. Check for actionable and accurate recommendations.

title: One-Click Fix Implementation Review
spec: Review includes/ai/OneClickFix.php for safe automated fix execution, rollback mechanisms, confirmation requirements, and coverage of common issues. Verify fixes don't cause unintended side effects.

title: REST Controller Base Review
spec: Review includes/rest/RestController.php for proper base controller implementation, common functionality, error handling patterns, and response formatting standards.

title: Dashboard REST Controller Review
spec: Review includes/rest/DashboardController.php for dashboard data endpoints, health score calculation API, activity fetching, and proper caching of expensive calculations.

title: Database REST Controllers Review
spec: Review includes/rest/DatabaseController.php and includes/rest/database/ controllers for all database operation endpoints. Check input validation, permission checks, and proper error responses.

title: Media REST Controllers Review
spec: Review includes/rest/MediaController.php and includes/rest/media/ controllers for media audit endpoints. Verify file operations security, proper response pagination, and error handling.

title: Performance REST Controllers Review
spec: Review includes/rest/PerformanceController.php and includes/rest/performance/ controllers for performance data endpoints. Check data accuracy and response structure.

title: Activity REST Controller Review
spec: Review includes/rest/ActivityController.php for activity log endpoints, filtering capabilities, pagination, and proper data sanitization in log entries.

title: REST API Security Review
spec: Review all REST endpoints for proper authentication (nonce verification), authorization (capability checks), input sanitization, output escaping, and rate limiting implementation.

title: Settings Registry Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/SettingsRegistry.php for central settings management, schema definition, validation logic, and WordPress options API integration.

title: Core Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/CoreSettings.php for core plugin settings definition, safe mode implementation, debug mode handling, and feature toggles.

title: Database Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/DatabaseSettings.php for cleanup threshold settings, retention period configuration, and validation of user inputs.

title: Media Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/MediaSettings.php for exclusion pattern settings, delete confirmation requirements, and safe defaults.

title: Performance Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/PerformanceSettings.php for heartbeat control settings, AJAX limits, and monitoring configuration options.

title: Scheduling Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/SchedulingSettings.php for cron schedule configuration, task enablement settings, and timezone handling.

title: Advanced Settings Domain Review
spec: Review includes/Settings/Domain/AdvancedSettings.php for REST API settings, rate limiting configuration, custom CSS handling, and export/import functionality.

title: Scheduler Registry Review
spec: Review includes/Scheduler/SchedulerRegistry.php for WP-Cron task registration, schedule management, and task discovery. Check for proper hook registration.

title: Abstract Scheduled Task Review
spec: Review includes/Scheduler/AbstractScheduledTask.php for base task implementation, progress tracking, error handling, and timeout management in long-running tasks.

title: Scheduler Contracts Review
spec: Review includes/Scheduler/Contracts/ for SchedulableInterface and SchedulerRegistryInterface definitions. Verify proper abstraction and extensibility.

title: Scheduler Traits Review
spec: Review includes/Scheduler/Traits/HasScheduledTasks.php for reusable scheduling functionality, proper trait composition, and method conflicts handling.

title: Integration Manager Review
spec: Review includes/integrations/IntegrationManager.php for plugin detection, integration registration, and capability discovery. Check for proper handling of missing plugins.

title: WooCommerce Integration Review
spec: Review includes/integrations/WooCommerce.php for WooCommerce-specific media detection, product image handling, and gallery integration. Verify compatibility with different WooCommerce versions.

title: Elementor Integration Review
spec: Review includes/integrations/Elementor.php for Elementor widget media detection, template scanning, and dynamic content handling. Check for Global Widgets support.

title: ACF Integration Review
spec: Review includes/integrations/Acf.php for ACF field media detection across image, gallery, file, and flexible content fields. Verify Repeater and Group field support.

title: Multilingual Integration Review
spec: Review includes/integrations/Multilingual.php for WPML and Polylang compatibility, translated media handling, and language-specific exclusions.

title: Activity Logger Service Review
spec: Review includes/Services/ActivityLogger.php for audit logging implementation, log rotation, storage efficiency, and queryable log structure. Check for sensitive data handling.

title: Configuration Service Review
spec: Review includes/Services/ConfigurationService.php for centralized configuration management, environment-specific settings, and runtime configuration changes.

title: Table Checker Service Review
spec: Review includes/Services/TableChecker.php for database table validation, schema verification, and missing table detection. Check for proper error reporting.

title: Transient Cache Review
spec: Review includes/Cache/TransientCache.php for WordPress transient integration, TTL management, key namespacing, and multisite support.

title: Memory Cache Review
spec: Review includes/Cache/MemoryCache.php for in-memory caching during request lifecycle, memory limits, and proper cleanup.

title: Object Cache Review
spec: Review includes/Cache/ObjectCache.php for object cache backend detection, wp_cache function wrapping, and fallback behavior.

title: Cache Factory Review
spec: Review includes/Cache/CacheFactory.php for cache strategy selection, proper factory pattern implementation, and configuration-based cache creation.

title: Health Score Circle Component Review
spec: Review assets/js/components/HealthScoreCircle.jsx for SVG rendering, animation performance, accessibility (ARIA labels), and responsive design. Check for proper React patterns.

title: Metric Card Component Review
spec: Review assets/js/components/MetricCard.jsx for data display, loading states, error handling, and visual consistency. Verify prop validation.

title: Quick Actions Component Review
spec: Review assets/js/components/QuickActions.jsx for action button functionality, confirmation dialogs, loading states, and keyboard accessibility.

title: Activity Timeline Component Review
spec: Review assets/js/components/ActivityTimeline.jsx for timeline rendering, date formatting, pagination, and real-time updates. Check for performance with many entries.

title: Recommendations Component Review
spec: Review assets/js/components/Recommendations.jsx for recommendation display, one-click fix integration, priority indicators, and action feedback.

title: Dashboard Entry Point Review
spec: Review assets/js/entries/dashboard.js for main dashboard initialization, API data fetching, state management, and error boundaries.

title: Database Health Entry Point Review
spec: Review assets/js/entries/database-health.js for database page functionality, table rendering, action handlers, and progress indicators for operations.

title: Media Audit Entry Point Review
spec: Review assets/js/entries/media-audit.js for media scanning UI, result filtering, bulk actions, and safe delete workflow.

title: Performance Entry Point Review
spec: Review assets/js/entries/performance.js for performance metrics display, chart rendering, and profiler results presentation.

title: Settings Entry Point Review
spec: Review assets/js/entries/settings.js for settings form handling, validation feedback, save/reset functionality, and import/export features.

title: JavaScript API Client Review
spec: Review assets/js/utils/api.js for REST API client implementation, error handling, request caching, and proper use of WordPress REST nonces.

title: JavaScript Accessibility Utils Review
spec: Review assets/js/utils/accessibility.js for screen reader announcements, focus management, keyboard navigation helpers, and WCAG compliance utilities.

title: Global Admin CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/admin.css for WordPress admin integration, proper specificity, responsive design, and dark mode compatibility if applicable.

title: Dashboard CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/dashboard.css for dashboard layout, health score styling, metric cards, and responsive breakpoints.

title: Database Health CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/database-health.css for table styling, action buttons, progress indicators, and consistency with plugin design.

title: Media Audit CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/media-audit.css for media grid layout, thumbnail styling, selection states, and responsive image handling.

title: Performance CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/performance.css for chart containers, profiler results styling, and metric displays.

title: Tables CSS Review
spec: Review assets/css/tables.css for WP List Table styling, sortable columns, pagination, and bulk action controls.

title: SQL Injection Prevention Review
spec: Review all files for SQL query safety, proper use of $wpdb->prepare() with placeholders, table name validation with regex, and esc_sql() usage. Check includes/database/ thoroughly.

title: XSS Prevention Review
spec: Review all output points for proper escaping: esc_html(), esc_attr(), esc_url(), esc_js(), wp_kses(). Check templates/, REST API responses, and JavaScript string handling.

title: CSRF Protection Review
spec: Review all form submissions and AJAX actions for proper nonce verification using wp_verify_nonce() and check_ajax_referer(). Verify nonce generation consistency.

title: Authentication and Authorization Review
spec: Review all endpoints and actions for proper capability checks (current_user_can), REST API permission callbacks, and admin-only access enforcement.

title: File Operations Security Review
spec: Review file system operations in includes/media/ for path traversal prevention, proper file type validation, safe deletion paths, and direct access protection in all PHP files.

title: Input Sanitization Review
spec: Review all user inputs from $_GET, $_POST, REST params for sanitization using sanitize_text_field(), absint(), sanitize_email(), and custom validators.

title: Unit Test Coverage Review
spec: Review tests/unit/ for test coverage of critical components (Database, Media, Performance modules). Identify untested code paths and missing test cases.

title: Integration Test Review
spec: Review tests/integration/ including RestApiTest.php for API endpoint testing, workflow tests, and proper mocking of WordPress functions.

title: Standalone Test Review
spec: Review tests/unit-standalone/ for tests that don't require WordPress, proper mock usage, and isolation of components.

title: Test Factory Review
spec: Review tests/factories/ (PostFactory, AttachmentFactory, CommentFactory) for proper test data generation, realistic data, and helper methods.

title: Test Configuration Review
spec: Review phpunit.xml, phpunit-standalone.xml, jest.config.js for proper test configuration, coverage reporting, and CI compatibility.

title: README Documentation Review
spec: Review README.md and readme.txt for accuracy, completeness, installation instructions, and feature documentation. Check WordPress plugin directory compliance.

title: Security Documentation Review
spec: Review SECURITY.md for comprehensive security measures documentation, vulnerability reporting process, and user security guidance.

title: Accessibility Documentation Review
spec: Review ACCESSIBILITY.md for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance documentation, keyboard navigation guide, and screen reader support details.

title: Performance Documentation Review
spec: Review PERFORMANCE.md for caching documentation, optimization strategies, and large site handling guidance.

title: Testing Documentation Review
spec: Review TESTING.md for test setup instructions, running tests guide, and contributing test guidelines.

title: Code Quality Documentation Review
spec: Review CODE_QUALITY.md for PHPCS, PHPStan, ESLint, Prettier setup documentation and coding standards reference.

title: Webpack Configuration Review
spec: Review webpack.config.js for proper entry points, code splitting, asset optimization, WordPress dependency externalization, and production build settings.

title: ESLint Configuration Review
spec: Review .eslintrc.json for proper linting rules, WordPress coding standards compliance, React/JSX rules, and custom rule justifications.

title: Babel Configuration Review
spec: Review .babelrc for proper transpilation targets, plugin configuration, and browser compatibility settings.

title: PHPStan Configuration Review
spec: Review phpstan.neon and phpstan-baseline.neon for static analysis level, WordPress stubs, ignored errors justification, and type coverage.

title: PHPCS Configuration Review
spec: Review phpcs.xml for WordPress Coding Standards compliance, custom sniff configuration, and excluded paths justification.

title: Composer Configuration Review
spec: Review composer.json for proper dependency management, autoload configuration, dev dependencies, and script definitions.

title: Package.json Configuration Review
spec: Review package.json for proper npm dependencies, script definitions, version specifications, and development tooling.

title: Admin Menu and Page Registration Review
spec: Review admin/Admin.php and includes/Admin.php for proper WordPress admin menu registration, page callbacks, and capability requirements.

title: Template Files Review
spec: Review all files in templates/admin/ (dashboard.php, database-health.php, media-audit.php, performance.php, settings.php) for proper escaping, WordPress template tags, and clean separation of concerns.

title: Network/Multisite Templates Review
spec: Review templates/network/ files for proper multisite support, network admin pages, and site-switching handling.

title: Asset Loading Review
spec: Review includes/Assets.php for proper script/style enqueueing, conditional loading by admin page, version strings for cache busting, and dependency management.

title: Batch Processor Review
spec: Review includes/BatchProcessor.php for generator-based processing, memory management, progress tracking, and timeout handling for large datasets.

title: Health Calculator Review
spec: Review includes/HealthCalculator.php for health score algorithm accuracy, weighted factor calculations, grade boundaries, and caching of computed scores.

title: Installer Review
spec: Review includes/Installer.php for plugin activation/deactivation hooks, database table creation, default settings initialization, and upgrade migrations.

title: Multisite Support Review
spec: Review includes/Multisite.php for network activation handling, site-specific vs network-wide settings, and proper blog switching.

title: Exception Handling Review
spec: Review includes/Exceptions/ for custom exception definitions, proper exception hierarchy, and meaningful error messages.

title: Main Plugin File Review
spec: Review wp-admin-health-suite.php for proper plugin headers, license, minimum requirements checks, and bootstrap logic.
